snippet.title: Rodina Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.elliptic-games.com

Rodina has been out for about a month now, and the reaction from players has been extremely positive. While the game is rough, players seem to be really connecting with the immersiveness, the challenge, and the story.

I couldn't be more pleased with the reactions from those who have liked the game, and I can't wait to continue developing it for them. But Rodina needs more support! Please do what you can to spread the word, to help ensure that this game has a long, bright future!
